00001 #define     WEAPONSFILENAME                           "TABLEDATA\\Weapons.dat"
00002 #define MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH              500
00003 
00004 enum
00005 {
00006       ELEMENT_NONE = 0,
00007       ELEMENT_LIST,
00008       ELEMENT,
00009       ELEMENT_PROPERTY,
00010 }
00011 typedef PARSE_STAGE;
00012 
00013 struct
00014 {
00015       PARSE_STAGE curElement;
00016 
00017       INT8              szCharData[MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH+1];
00018       WEAPONTYPE        curWeapon;
00019       WEAPONTYPE *      curWeaponList;
00020       UINT32                  maxWeapons;
00021       
00022       UINT32                  currentDepth;
00023       UINT32                  maxReadDepth;

00028 static void XMLCALL
00029 StartElementHandle(void *userData, const char *name, const char **atts)
00030 {
00031       ParseData * pData = (ParseData *)userData;
00032 
00033       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) //are we reading this element?
00034       {
00035             if(strcmp(name, "LIST") == 0 && pData->curElement == ELEMENT_NONE)
00036             {
00037                   pData->curElement = ELEMENTLIST;
00038 
00039                   memset(pData->curWeaponList,0,sizeof(WEAPONTYPE)*pData->maxWeapons);
00040 
00041                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00042             }
00043             else if(strcmp(name, "WEAPON") == 0 && pData->curElement == ELEMENTLIST)
00044             {
00045                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00046 
00047                   memset(&pData->curWeapon,0,sizeof(WEAPONTYPE));
00048 
00049                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00050             }
00051             else if(pData->curElement == ELEMENT &&
00052                         (strcmp(name, "uiIndex") == 0 ||
00053                         strcmp(name, "szWeaponName") == 0 ||
00054                         strcmp(name, "ubWeaponClass") == 0 ||
00055                         strcmp(name, "ubWeaponType") == 0 ||
00056                         strcmp(name, "ubCalibre") == 0 ||
00057                         strcmp(name, "ubReadyTime") == 0 ||
00058                         strcmp(name, "ubShotsPer4Turns") == 0 ||
00059                         strcmp(name, "ubShotsPerBurst") == 0 ||
00060                         strcmp(name, "ubBurstPenalty") == 0 ||
00061                         strcmp(name, "ubBulletSpeed") == 0 ||
00062                         strcmp(name, "ubImpact") == 0 ||
00063                         strcmp(name, "ubDeadliness") == 0 ||
00064                         strcmp(name, "bAccuracy") == 0 ||
00065                         strcmp(name, "ubMagSize") == 0 ||
00066                         strcmp(name, "usRange")  == 0 ||
00067                         strcmp(name, "usReloadDelay") == 0 ||
00068                         strcmp(name, "ubAttackVolume") == 0 ||
00069                         strcmp(name, "ubHitVolume") == 0 ||
00070                         strcmp(name, "sSound") == 0 ||
00071                         strcmp(name, "sBurstSound") == 0 ||
00072                         strcmp(name, "sReloadSound") == 0 ||
00073                         strcmp(name, "sLocknLoadSound") == 0 ||
00074                         strcmp(name, "bBaseAutofireCost") == 0 ||
00075                         strcmp(name, "bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP") == 0))
00076             {
00077                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_PROPERY;
00078 
00079                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00080             }
00081 
00082             pData->szCharData[0] = '\0';
00083       }
00084 
00085       pData->currentDepth++;
00086 
00087 }
00088 
00089 static void XMLCALL
00090 weaponCharacterDataHandle(void *userData, const char *str, int len)
00091 {
00092       weaponParseData * pData = (weaponParseData *)userData;
00093 
00094       if( (pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) && 
00095             (strlen(pData->szCharData) < MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH)
00096         ){
00097             strncat(pData->szCharData,str,__min((unsigned int)len,MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH-strlen(pData->szCharData)));
00098       }
00099 }

00102 static void XMLCALL
00103 weaponEndElementHandle(void *userData, const char *name)
00104 {
00105       weaponParseData * pData = (weaponParseData *)userData;
00106 
00107       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) //we're at the end of an element that we've been reading
00108       {
00109             if(strcmp(name, "WEAPONLIST") == 0)
00110             {
00111                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_NONE;
00112             }
00113             else if(strcmp(name, "WEAPON") == 0)
00114             {
00115                   pData->curElement = ELEMENTLIST;
00116 
00117                   if(pData->curWeapon.uiIndex < pData->maxWeapons)
00118                   {
00119                         pData->curWeaponList[pData->curWeapon.uiIndex] = pData->curWeapon; //write the weapon into the table
00120                   }
00121             }
00122             else if(strcmp(name, "uiIndex") == 0)
00123             {
00124                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00125                   pData->curWeapon.uiIndex = atol(pData->szCharData);
00126             }
00127             else if(strcmp(name, "szWeaponName") == 0)
00128             {
00129                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00130 
00131                   if(MAX_NAME_LENGTH >= strlen(pData->szCharData))
00132                         strcpy(pData->curWeapon.szWeaponName,pData->szCharData);
00133                   else
00134                   {
00135                         strncpy(pData->curWeapon.szWeaponName,pData->szCharData,MAX_NAME_LENGTH);
00136                         pData->curWeapon.szWeaponName[MAX_NAME_LENGTH] = '\0';
00137                   }
00138             }
00139             else if(strcmp(name, "ubWeaponClass") == 0)
00140             {
00141                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00142                   pData->curWeapon.ubWeaponClass = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00143             }
00144             else if(strcmp(name, "ubWeaponType") == 0)
00145             {
00146                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00147                   pData->curWeapon.ubWeaponType = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00148             }
00149             else if(strcmp(name, "ubCalibre") == 0)
00150             {
00151                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00152                   pData->curWeapon.ubCalibre = (UINT8) atol(pData->szCharData);
00153             }
00154             else if(strcmp(name, "ubReadyTime") == 0)

00258 
00259 BOOLEAN ReadInWeaponStats()
00260 {
00261       HWFILE            hFile;
00262       UINT32            uiBytesRead;
00263       UINT32            uiFSize;
00264       CHAR8 *           lpcBuffer;
00265       XML_Parser  parser = XML_ParserCreate(NULL);
00266       
00267       weaponParseData pData;
00268 
00269       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Loading weapons.dat" );
00270 
00271       // Open weapons file
00272       hFile = FileOpen( WEAPONSFILENAME, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00273       if ( !hFile )
00274             return( FALSE );
00275       
00276       uiFSize = FileGetSize(hFile);
00277       lpcBuffer = (CHAR8 *) MemAlloc(uiFSize+1);
00278 
00279       //Read in block
00280       if ( !FileRead( hFile, lpcBuffer, uiFSize, &uiBytesRead ) )
00281       {
00282             MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00283             return( FALSE );
00284       }
00285 
00286       lpcBuffer[uiFSize] = 0; //add a null terminator
00287 
00288       FileClose( hFile );
00289 
00290       
00291       XML_SetElementHandler(parser, weaponStartElementHandle, weaponEndElementHandle);
00292       XML_SetCharacterDataHandler(parser, weaponCharacterDataHandle);
00293 
00294       
00295       memset(&pData,0,sizeof(pData));
00296       pData.curWeaponList = Weapon;
00297       pData.maxWeapons = MAXITEMS; 
00298       
00299       XML_SetUserData(parser, &pData);
00300 
00301 
00302     if(!XML_Parse(parser, lpcBuffer, uiFSize, TRUE))
00303       {
00304             CHAR8 errorBuf[511];
00305 
00306             sprintf(errorBuf, "XML Parser Error in Weapons.dat: %s at line %d", XML_ErrorString(XML_GetErrorCode(parser)), XML_GetCurrentLineNumber(parser));
00307             LiveMessage(errorBuf);
00308 
00309             MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00310             return FALSE;
00311       }
00312 
00313       MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00314 
00315 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00316       //Debug code; make sure that what we got from the file is the same as what's there
00317       // Open a new file
00318       hFile = FileOpen( "TABLEDATA\\~Weapons.dat", FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00319       if ( !hFile )
00320             return( FALSE );
00321       
00322       {
00323             UINT32 cnt;
00324 
00325             FilePrintf(hFile,"<WEAPONLIST>\r\n");
00326             for(cnt = 0;cnt < MAXITEMS;cnt++)
00327             {
00328                   INT8 * szRemainder = Weapon[cnt].szWeaponName; //the remaining string to be output (for making valid XML)
00329 
00330                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t<WEAPON>\r\n");
00331                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<uiIndex>%d</uiIndex>\r\n",                                                     Weapon[cnt].uiIndex);
00332 
00333                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<szWeaponName>");
00334                   while(szRemainder[0] != '\0')
00335                   {
00336                         UINT32 uiCharLoc = strcspn(szRemainder,"&<>\'\"\0");
00337                         INT8 invChar = szRemainder[uiCharLoc];
00338                         
00339                         if(uiCharLoc)
00340                         {
00341                               szRemainder[uiCharLoc] = '\0';
00342                               FilePrintf(hFile,"%s",szRemainder);
00343                               szRemainder[uiCharLoc] = invChar;
00344                         }
00345 
00346                         szRemainder += uiCharLoc;
00347 
00348                         switch(invChar)
00349                         {
00350                               case '&':
00351                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&amp;");
00352                                     szRemainder++;
00353                               break;
00354 
00355                               case '<':
00356                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&lt;");
00357                                     szRemainder++;
00358                               break;
00359 
00360                               case '>':
00361                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&gt;");
00362                                     szRemainder++;
00363                               break;
00364 
00365                               case '\'':
00366                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&apos;");
00367                                     szRemainder++;
00368                               break;
00369 
00370                               case '\"':
00371                                     FilePrintf(hFile,"&quot;");
00372                                     szRemainder++;
00373                               break;
00374                         }
00375                   }
00376                   FilePrintf(hFile,"</szWeaponName>\r\n");
00377 
00378                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubWeaponClass>%d</ubWeaponClass>\r\n",                                   Weapon[cnt].ubWeaponClass);
00379                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubWeaponType>%d</ubWeaponType>\r\n",                                     Weapon[cnt].ubWeaponType);
00380                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubCalibre>%d</ubCalibre>\r\n",                                           Weapon[cnt].ubCalibre);
00381                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubReadyTime>%d</ubReadyTime>\r\n",                                       Weapon[cnt].ubReadyTime);
00382                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubShotsPer4Turns>%d</ubShotsPer4Turns>\r\n",                             Weapon[cnt].ubShotsPer4Turns);
00383                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubShotsPerBurst>%d</ubShotsPerBurst>\r\n",                         Weapon[cnt].ubShotsPerBurst);
00384                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubBurstPenalty>%d</ubBurstPenalty>\r\n",                                 Weapon[cnt].ubBurstPenalty);
00385                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubBulletSpeed>%d</ubBulletSpeed>\r\n",                                   Weapon[cnt].ubBulletSpeed);
00386                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubImpact>%d</ubImpact>\r\n",                                                   Weapon[cnt].ubImpact);
00387                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubDeadliness>%d</ubDeadliness>\r\n",                                     Weapon[cnt].ubDeadliness);
00388                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<bAccuracy>%d</bAccuracy>\r\n",                                           Weapon[cnt].bAccuracy);
00389                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubMagSize>%d</ubMagSize>\r\n",                                           Weapon[cnt].ubMagSize);
00390                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<usRange>%d</usRange>\r\n",                                                     Weapon[cnt].usRange);
00391                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<usReloadDelay>%d</usReloadDelay>\r\n",                                   Weapon[cnt].usReloadDelay);
00392                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubAttackVolume>%d</ubAttackVolume>\r\n",                                 Weapon[cnt].ubAttackVolume);
00393                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<ubHitVolume>%d</ubHitVolume>\r\n",                                       Weapon[cnt].ubHitVolume);
00394                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<sSound>%d</sSound>\r\n",                                                       Weapon[cnt].sSound);
00395                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<sBurstSound>%d</sBurstSound>\r\n",                                       Weapon[cnt].sBurstSound);
00396                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<sReloadSound>%d</sReloadSound>\r\n",                                     Weapon[cnt].sReloadSound);
00397                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<sLocknLoadSound>%d</sLocknLoadSound>\r\n",                         Weapon[cnt].sLocknLoadSound);
00398                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<bBaseAutofireCost>%d</bBaseAutofireCost>\r\n",                     Weapon[cnt].bBaseAutofireCost);
00399                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP>%d</bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP>\r\n",   Weapon[cnt].bAutofireShotsPerFiveAP);
00400                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t</WEAPON>\r\n");
00401             }
00402             FilePrintf(hFile,"</WEAPONLIST>\r\n");
00403       }
00404       FileClose( hFile );
00405 #endif
00406 
00407       XML_ParserFree(parser);
00408 
00409       return( TRUE );
00410 }
